elements.text:
A random person comes up to you to ask you a question, but all you can manage in response is a quiet mumble they can't hear. You start wondering what their response will be.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: They think you're being rude to them.
I rue the condition I'm in, but know that I will adjust.
They will be patient with you.
It may be difficult to speak up, but I will still be able to express myself.
They assume that their hearing was just not good enough and will just ask you to repeat waht you said.
